CustomField.description:
Stores notes about the Journey creation. For example: "OtherJourney", "JourneyError", "rcid not found".
In System Use: 'Campaign Member: After Save Automations; 'Moment: After Save Automations'
External Systems Utilization: None
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores notes about the Journey creation. For example: "OtherJourney", "JourneyError", "rcid not found".
CustomField.label: Ops Notes
